title: Khloe Kardashian still doesn't feel ready to date other men after Tristan Thompson split
text:

Khloe Kardashian has revealed she is not ready to date yet after her ex Tristan Thompson cheated on her with her sister Kylie's best friend Jordyn Woods.

The mum of one, 35, said that she has forgiven him for being unfaithful and that she puts her daughter, True, first when it comes to co parenting.

She added that she was tempted to not let Tristan see True after he destroyed their relationship, but she knows that would not be fair on her daughter.

(Image: Getty Images North America)

Appearing on Jay Shetty's On Purpose podcast, Khloe opened up about her private life in detail.

She said: About eight months ago, I had a breakup and so figuring out, I think people are so good at distracting and I've really chosen to not distract myself or try to not distract myself.

"Maybe people can say True would be a distraction, but if anything, she's a healthy distraction."

She added: "I haven't jumped into dating. I don't care to date right now. I'm not in a rush for it," she continued. "I feel so good in my life and I don't really need much else."

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

She explained that holding on to anger against Tristan, who cheated twice while she was pregnant, would only hurt her.

"I don't think he's a bad person, I think we all make mistakes, we're humans", she added.

Earlier this year, it emerged Tristan had kissed her sister Kylie 's BFF Jordyn, 22, at a house party.

The scandal sent shockwaves through the family and caused one of the biggest fallouts in reality TV history.

(Image: AFP/Getty Images)

Khloe split from Tristan, Kylie stopped speaking to Jordyn, and all hell broke loose within the tight-knit family.

Tristan has reportedly been trying to make amends ever since, even buying Khloe a Porche to try to win back her affections.

"It's a beautiful thing to also forgive her dad, he's a great person," said Khloe. "Maybe him and I weren't compatible in that way, but that's okay. I always want True to be surrounded by love. I just want her to always feel bliss just as much as I can."

"It's hard, it's not easy for me. It would be easier for me to keep my daughter away and be like, 'No, 'cause you hurt me.' But, he never hurt True.

(Image: Eric Charbonneau/REX/Shutterstoc)

"Him and I have our own relationship, and then Tristan and True have theirs. And I will never come in between that, I don't believe in that."

Khloe also said on the podcast that she does not people to feel sorry for her.

"It's natural to almost be the victim. It's natural, especially when you're on this platform and the whole world is like, 'I feel so bad for you,' okay thank you, but, this has happened to I'm sure hundreds of people before", she explained.

(Image: Khloe Kardashian/Instagram)

"Not saying it's right, I'm just saying, I'm not gonna die, we're all fine and I want to show my daughter, it's okay."

She also revealed that the Kardashian clan tend to sweep things under the rug and pretend they never happened.

She said they are "good at moving on" from traumatic events in their lives, but they often do it without really talking "about that things that happened.

"I don't know if that's healthy or not", she pondered.
description: The reality star said she has forgiven her cheating ex, but she is not ready to find love again yet
